snippet: Microsoft shareholders approved the pay package despite concerns raised by an investor advisory group.
abstract: Microsoft shareholders approve $84 million pay package for new chief executive Satya Nadella despite concerns raised by investor advisory group Institutional Shareholder Services.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft shareholders approved the pay package despite concerns raised by an investor advisory group.

headline.main: Satya Nadella, Microsoft Chief, to Get $84 Million Pay Package
headline.print_headline: New Microsoft Chief to Get $84 Million Pay Package
